item.title: The Flicker of Hope
item.description: The sun sets low, the day is done, A quiet hush, the world’s undone. But in the stillness, there’s a spark, A glimmer bright, a shining mark. For though the night may seem so long, And darkness looms, so fierce and strong, There’s hope that flickers, like a flame, And guides us through, when all’s the same. So hold on tight, and don’t let go, For soon enough, the light will show.
